abstract: Pat Schoenfeld completes the memoir of her late husband, Gerald.
snippet: Pat Schoenfeld completes the memoir of her late husband, Gerald.
lead_paragraph: Pat Schoenfeld, the widow of the powerful Broadway theater owner and producer Gerald Schoenfeld, has completed work on his forthcoming memoir, "Mr. Broadway: The Inside Story of the Shuberts, the Shows and the Stars," which is set to be published in April by Applause Books. As the longtime chairman of the Shubert Organization, Mr. Schoenfeld, along with his business partner Bernard B. Jacobs, provided homes to some of the greatest Broadway hits, including "A Chorus Line," "Cats," "Les Misérables," and "The Phantom of the Opera."

headline.main: A Memoir From 'Mr. Broadway,' With an Assist From Mrs. Broadway
